Module it.polimi.ingsw

Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.action

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Action
    Every action performed by the player that alter the Model has to implements this interface
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApolloSwapAction  
    BuildAction
    The BuildAction is called whenever a player wants to build every kind of level The construction of a Block/Dome is transparent to the player who wants to build
    BuildDomeAction
    The BuildDomeAction is used only if ATLAS is in game and a player wants to build a Dome .
    MinotaurPushAction  
    MoveAction
    The MoveAction update the workers position and the gameMap
    PlaceWorkerAction
    The Place worker action lets you place the worker on the board in the square you want if it is free
    SelectWorkerAction
    The Select worker action mark the Worker as SELECTED
    ZeusBuildAction  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ActionOutcome
